ThingDef.label: Lightsaber
ThingDef.description: The lightsaber, also referred to as a laser sword by those who were unfamiliar with it, was a weapon usually used by the Jedi, Sith, and other Force-sensitives. Lightsabers consisted of a plasma blade, powered by a kyber crystal, that was emitted from a usually metal hilt and could be shut off at will. It was a weapon that required skill and training, and was greatly enhanced when used in conjunction with the Force.

ThingDef.label: Curved Lightsaber
ThingDef.description: A curved lightsaber features a hilt with a curved design, offering unique handling and combat capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Lightsaber(Shoto)
ThingDef.description: A shoto lightsaber, also known as a short lightsaber, is a smaller variant of the traditional lightsaber. Its compact size offers agility and versatility in combat.

ThingDef.label: Dual Lightsaber
ThingDef.description: A dual-bladed lightsaber, also known as a double-bladed lightsaber, is a weapon with a blade emitting from both ends of the hilt. It requires skilled handling to wield effectively.

ThingDef.label: hood
ThingDef.description: A draped hood which covers the head and ears.

ThingDef.label: Cloak
ThingDef.description: This cloak shields the wearer from the sun and dust.

ThingDef.label: Force Sensitive Robe
ThingDef.description: The robes worn by Force users, such as Jedi or Sith, are typically flowing garments made of durable fabric, designed to reflect their connection to the Force and offer freedom of movement during combat and meditation.

ThingDef.label: Force Sensitive Armor
ThingDef.description: An armored designed to be lightweight, flexible, and imbued with Force-sensitive materials, designed to offer protection while allowing freedom of movement for its wearer.

ThingDef.label: Imperial Knight Armor
ThingDef.description: The Imperial Knight armor from Star Wars is a formidable and sleek ensemble designed to evoke authority and power, worn by elite warriors sworn to protect the Emperor and enforce his will. Crafted with advanced technology and reinforced materials, it blends functionality with an imposing aesthetic, embodying the strength and loyalty of those who don it in service to the Fel Empire.

ThingDef.label: Blade of Talzin
ThingDef.description: The lightsaber, also referred to as a laser sword by those who were unfamiliar with it, was a weapon usually used by the Jedi, Sith, and other Force-sensitives. Lightsabers consisted of a plasma blade, powered by a kyber crystal, that was emitted from a usually metal hilt and could be shut off at will. It was a weapon that required skill and training, and was greatly enhanced when used in conjunction with the Force.
